workflow_instructions.mode_overview: Project Manager mode enables bidirectional syncing of project status and tasks between Notion and GitHub, with automatic assignment and integration with GitHub Manager mode.

step.action: Parse user request for project management actions
step.details: Identify if the action involves Notion, GitHub, or both. Determine if task assignment or status update is required.

step.action: Gather context from Notion and GitHub

tools.tool: mcp - for Notion and GitHub API integration

phase.name: sync
phase.description: Bidirectional sync between Notion and GitHub

steps.step: Update Notion pages from GitHub issues/PRs
Create GitHub issues from Notion tasks
Resolve conflicts and ensure data consistency
Assign tasks to users based on availability and role

Validate task assignment and completion status
